about.title: About Me
about.txt:
I am currently serving in Republic Of Korea Army to finish my compulsory military service.

Before I was in Korean Army, I was pursuing my passion for technology and mathematics in the University Of Maryland, College Park.

I love learning new concepts and applying my new knowledge by building and conceptualizing various projects and products.

I am always open to new ideas and improving my skills.

I am currently deeply interested in Machine Learning, graphic design, PCB design, and mechanical keyboards.

item.txt:
University Of Maryland, College Park
BS in Computer Science
Class Of 2024
GPA: 3.90
Honors College

item.name: The Republic of Korea Army
item.description: Coordinated, supervised and trained motor transport squad members. Communicated squad related details to superiors. Operated and maintained military vehicle for artillery battery. Appointed to motor transport squad leader on May 2021.

item.name: Skonec Entertainment
item.description: Helped designing a VR theater application that connects to LG VOD service using Unity. Planned a critical design review and organized internal APIs for the application to properly communicate with LG VOD server.

item.name: GMU Dept. of Physics and Astronomy
item.description: Assisted Dr. Indu Satija to further understand a mathematical object called Hofstadter’s Butterfly. Generated and analyzed the correlation between Hofstadter’s Butterfly and Integral Apollonian Circles using Java.

item.name: Sokket!
item.description: Sokket is a PC & mobile combo application that allows you to control your PC with your mobile device.

item.name: OracleBone
item.description: CJK character dictionary mobile application that displays character’s meaning, related words, and difficulty levels in Chinese, Japanese, and Korean.

item.name: Food Pool
item.award: Best UI/UX Hack, Best use of Google Cloud, Best UiPath Automation Hack
item.description: Service where friends and strangers could come together to make a group delivery order and communicate through a live group chat.

item.name: iGraduated
item.description: A platform that helps schools to arrange virtual graduation ceremony without losing the excitement of the event.

item.name: M.O.E.G.A.
item.description: A web application for hosting elementary & middle school online lectures with features that simulate in-person lectures.

item.name: Personal website & logo
item.description: well... You are looking at it right now! This website and logo was designed while I was in the military.

item.name: SupplyMe
item.description: SupplyMe is an application to connect users with pharmacies during pandemics such as the current COVID-19 crisis. Stores notify users with their available supply to prevent clustering and spreading.

item.name: Number Recognition Neural Network
item.description: A rudimentary feedforward neural network built from scratch that recognizes 28x28 handwritten images of a certain digit. Trained with MNIST handwritten digits training set and written in C#.

item.name: Tilted
item.description: A mobile app to go along with the popular online game called League of Legends. Analyzes in-game player records to estimate the possible win chance of the current game and provides various statistics about other in-game players.
